languages.text: Прежде чем отправляться в палаты плазмадвигателя, Кибелла просит Лорд-капитана провести ритуал кровавого благословения ее на охоту за Немезитом.
Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah has asked the Lord Captain to perform a blood rite that would bless her hunt for Nemesite.
languages.original_text: Прежде чем отправляться в палаты плазмадвигателя, Кибелла просит Лорд-капитана провести ритуал кровавого благословения ее на охоту за Немезитом.

traits.locale_text: Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah asked the Lord Captain to perform a benediction rite to bless her on the hunt for Nemesite.
Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah asked the Lord Captain to perform a benediction rite to bless her on the hunt for Nemesite.
Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah asked the Lord Captain to perform a benediction rite that would bless her on her hunt for Nemesite.
Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah asked the Lord Captain to perform a benediction rite that would bless her on her hunt for Nemesite.
Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah has asked the Lord Captain to perform a blood rite that would bless her hunt for Nemesite.
Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah has asked the Lord Captain to perform a blood rite that would bless her hunt for Nemesite.

languages.text: Vor dem Aufbruch zu den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern hat Kibellah den Lord Captain gebeten, ein Blutritual durchzuführen, um ihre Jagd auf Nemesit zu segnen.
languages.original_text: Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah has asked the Lord Captain to perform a blood rite that would bless her hunt for Nemesite.

traits.locale_text: Vor dem Aufbruch zu den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern hat Kibellah den Lord Captain gebeten, ein Blutritual durchzuführen, um ihre Jagd auf Nemesit zu segnen.

languages.text: Antes de dirigirse a las cámaras del motor de plasma, Kibellah ha pedido {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán que realice con ella un ritual de sangre para bendecir su cacería de Nemesitio.
languages.original_text: Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah has asked the Lord Captain to perform a blood rite that would bless her hunt for Nemesite.

traits.locale_text: Antes de dirigirse a las cámaras del motor de plasma, Kibellah ha pedido {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán que realice con ella un ritual de sangre para bendecir su cacería de Nemesitio.

languages.text: プラズマドライブ室に向かう前に、キベラはネメサイトの狩りを祝福する血の儀式を執り行うよう、ロード・キャプテンに頼んだ。
languages.original_text: Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah has asked the Lord Captain to perform a blood rite that would bless her hunt for Nemesite.

traits.locale_text: プラズマドライブ室に向かう前に、キベラはネメサイトの狩りを祝福する血の儀式を執り行うよう、ロード・キャプテンに頼んだ。

languages.text: 前往等离子驱动室之前，绮贝菈要求领主舰长举行鲜血仪式，保佑她顺利追捕涅墨斯特。
languages.original_text: Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah has asked the Lord Captain to perform a blood rite that would bless her hunt for Nemesite.

traits.locale_text: 前往等离子驱动室之前，绮贝菈要求领主舰长举行鲜血仪式，保佑她顺利追捕涅墨斯特。

languages.text: Avant de se rendre dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma, Kibellah a demandé {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} d'accomplir un rituel de sang pour bénir sa chasse à l'homme.
languages.original_text: Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah has asked the Lord Captain to perform a blood rite that would bless her hunt for Nemesite.

traits.locale_text: Avant de se rendre dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma, Kibellah a demandé {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} d'accomplir un rituel de sang pour bénir sa chasse à l'homme.

languages.text: Kibellah, plazma iticisi odalarına doğru ilerlemeden önce Lord Kaptan'dan Nemezit avını kutsayacak bir kan ayini gerçekleştirmesini istiyor.
languages.original_text: Before heading to the plasma drive chambers, Kibellah has asked the Lord Captain to perform a blood rite that would bless her hunt for Nemesite.
